mapper.select: select * from notice order by notice_register_date DESC
select * from notice where notice_title like concat('%',#{notice_title},'%') order by notice_register_date DESC
select * from notice where notice_num = #{notice_num} order by notice_register_date DESC
mapper.insert: insert into notice(userinfo_nick, notice_title, notice_content, notice_hit) values(#{userinfo_nick}, #{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, 0)
